Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 豈 indicates the sound; 白 (white) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 白 [ bái ] white; clear, pure, unblemished; bright
    • 豈 [ qǐ ] what; how
①见“皑”。

Original meaning 本义: Meaning brilliant white.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 白雪皚皚 bái xuě ái ái (snow gleams white)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 霜雪之白也從白豈聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 皚 from white-moon 白 bái and phonetic drum (岂)豈 qǐ simp 皑.

皚字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【白字部】　皚； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页788第35
【唐韻】五來切【集韻】【正韻】魚開切【韻會】疑開切，?艾平聲。【說文】霜雪之白也。【漢·劉歆·遂初賦】漂積雪之皚皚。【晉·左貴嬪·離思賦】霜皚皚而依庭。【杜甫·晚晴詩】崖沈谷沒白皚皚。　又【集韻】魚衣切，音沂。義同。又【劉楨·贈五官中郞將詩】凉風吹沙礫，霜氣何皚皚。明月照緹幕，華燈散炎輝。　【集韻】或作?凒溰。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [White Word Department] 　 Ai; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 788 35
[Tang Yun] Five to cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Fish cut [Rhyme] Suspicious cut,? Ai Pingsheng. [Said the text] Frost and snow are also white. 【Han·Liu Xin·Suichu Fu】The whiteness of drifting snow. 【Jin·Zuo Guibing·Lisi Fu】The frost is covered in the garden. [Du Fu·Wan Qing Poem] The cliff sinks and the valley is not white.　[Jiyun] Yuyi cut, sound Yi. The same meaning. Also [Liu Zhen·Poems of General Yan in the Five Senses] The cool breeze blows the gravel, how white is the frost. The bright moon shines on the curtain, and the lanterns scatter the flames.　【Jiyun】Or for? 凒溰.
